snippet: Victoria Chase, 54, is a student at Boricua College, where she maintains a 3.8 grade-point average and has her eye on a business administration degree.
abstract: Catholic Charities Brooklyn and Queens secures the funds needed by Victoria Chase of Brooklyn to purchase a computer and software in order to pursue her bachelor’s degree.
lead_paragraph: Victoria Chase, 54, is a student at Boricua College, where she maintains a 3.8 grade-point average and has her eye on a business administration degree.

headline.seo: A New Laptop Helps a Grandmother Do Her Homework
headline.main: Breezing Through College Coursework, and Helping to Care for Grandchildren
headline.print_headline: Breezing Through College Coursework, And Helping to Care for Grandchildren
